title: Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Establishment of Office of Director of Authorised
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (State Authority) (No. 3) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (state authority) (no 3) order 2024

title: Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Establishment of Office of Director of Authorised
heading: 2. The Office of Director of Authorised Intervention established under the
text_raw:
2. The Office of Director of Authorised Intervention established under the 
Institutional Burials Act 2022 (Establishment of Office of Director of Authorised 
Intervention, Tuam) Order 2023 (S.I. No. 87 of 2023) is prescribed for the 
purposes of paragraph (j) of the definition of “State authority” in section 31(1) 
of the National Treasury Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 
of 2014). 

The Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth consents 
to the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

13 December, 2024. 

RODERIC O'GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2024. 

JACK CHAMBERS, 

Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 24th December, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [708] 3
